description: This endowed scholarship is in memory of Elaine Bartgis, Edmond's first female police officer. The purpose is to support a student majoring in Criminal Justice. Eligibility Requirements Criminal Justice major Minimum 2.5 GPA Complete financial need statement

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
